org.eclipse.incquery.viewers.runtime.model

Class ViewerDataFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.incquery.viewers.runtime.model.ViewerDataFilter

  • public class ViewerDataFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class for filter definitions. It is used to create filtered observable lists for patterns. A filter definition is considered unchangeable

    Warning After using a filter to create a ViewerDataFilter, the updates of this filter will not be pushed to the Filter

    Author:
    Zoltan Ujhelyi

        public org.eclipse.incquery.viewers.runtime.model.ViewerDataFilter.MatchList<IPatternMatch> getObservableList(Pattern pattern,
                                                                                                     RuleEngine engine)
        Returns an observable list of pattern matches, taking account the existing filter rules for a pattern. If no filtering rule is defined for the selected pattern, all matches are returned.
